briefTitle: Clinical Validation of the Role of microRNA Binding Site Mutations in Cancer Risk, Prevention and Treatment
officialTitle: Clinical Validation of the Role of microRNA Binding Site Mutations in Cancer Risk, Prevention and Treatment
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Measuring the prevalence of the KRAS-variant in certain populations Prevalence of the KRAS-variant in BRCA negative breast cancer patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Personal or family history of cancer
* Personal history of endometriosis, or autoimmunity

Exclusion Criteria:

* Younger than 18
* Non-english speaking and unable to understand and sign the consent
